ygData.subject: Crawl-report and seeds report not available from the GUI after the job is finished
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all. It seems, that in version 1.4.0 the crawl-reports and seeds reports are not available from the GUI after the job is finished. On the screen, you get

Dear all.

It seems, that in version 1.4.0 the crawl-reports and seeds repo=
rts are not
available from the GUI after the job is finished.
On the screen=
, you get the message: "No statistics associated with job".

regards
